tool_description: Analyzes historical carrier performance metrics including delivery times, damage rates, and service reliability to inform carrier selection decisions.

carrier_codes.description: List of carrier codes to analyze

analysis_period_days.description: Number of days to include in analysis

origin_zip.description: Origin ZIP code for route-specific analysis

destination_zip.description: Destination ZIP code for route-specific analysis

service_types.description: Service types to include in analysis

minimum_shipments.description: Minimum number of shipments required for meaningful analysis

error_messages: Insufficient data: Not enough historical shipments for reliable analysis
Invalid analysis period: Period must be between 7 and 365 days
Carrier not found: One or more carrier codes not recognized
Route not supported: No historical data available for specified route
usage: Provide carrier_codes, origin_zip, destination_zip, and optionally adjust analysis_period_days, service_types, and minimum_shipments to analyze carrier performance.

performance_scores.description: Performance scores for each carrier analyzed

on_time_delivery_rates.description: On-time delivery percentages for each carrier

average_transit_times.description: Average transit times in business days for each carrier

damage_rates.description: Package damage rates as percentages for each carrier
